pageContext.claim: “The LameStream Media had a very bad week. They pushed numerous phony stories and got caught, especially The Failing New York Times, which has lost more money over the last 10 years than any paper in history, and The Amazon Washington Post. They are The Enemy of the People!”
pageContext.analysis: The New York Times has been consistently profitable for the past ten years, so Trump is simply making up this claim. (The New York Times had reported that tax returns it had obtained Trump lost more than $1 billion over ten years, likely more than any other American between 1995 and 1984.)
